## BinariesService.upload() method

Uploads a single binary file. This operation returns an instance of 'BinaryUploadResponse' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static upload(file: Blob): CancelablePromise<BinaryUploadResponse>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description        |
| --------- | ---- | ------------------ |
| file      | Blob | File for uploading |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BinaryUploadResponse](./open-api-client.binaryuploadresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

BinaryUploadResponse The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

## Exceptions

ApiError
